alert.note: Alert for Coffee (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Coffee and northwestern Geneva Counties through 945 PM CDT... At 911 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Opp, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elba, New Brockton, Lee, Kinston, Pine Level, Mixons Crossroads, Perry Store, Curtis, Carl Folsom A/p, Ino, Turner Crossroads, Camp Humming Hills, Wise Mill, Goodman, Basin, Woodland Grove Church, Alberton, Richburg, Danleys Crossroads and Rhoades. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
